Text: Mom, dad, Claire. How are you? Anything new going on?

I'm on a desert island now. How many days now has it
been since my raft and I washed ashore here? I can't
really recall.
But don't worry. I'm fine. After all—

Your coconut juice, Cid. I cooled it with spring
water.
Wow, this is ice-cold...
I found some fruit for you, my lord. Sweet and tasty.
Wow, so sweet...
(There's absolutely nothing "survival" about this!)

(Not enough water! Dwindling food supplies! No means
of escape in sight! Panic and suspicion on the rise!
That's what I imagined, but no.)

(If anything, it's only made the pampering worse! I
haven't faced a single hardship with food or shelter.
Never underestimate super-beings or geniuses!)
Dammit... It wasn't supposed to be like this...!
Is something wrong, my lord?
Nope, nothing!

About today's lunch...how does spiced fowl sound? I
caught some birds just this morning, so it will be
very fresh.

I've got some lively fish straight from the sea, too.
They won't last long, though, so I recommend we eat
them today instead.

Don't you think he's had too much fish lately?
He needs a more balanced diet.

If balance is your concern, then I'd think eating
more of something high in nutrients like fish would
be better.

(Again with the bickering... Were Alpha and Zeta
always on bad of terms like this?)

(At this point I'm beginning to think there's
something more going on than just strong preferences.
Not sure what it could be, though.)
Meat.
Nope, Fish.

...Okay, I'm going for a walk along the shore.
I'll come back once you've decided.

Ugh, I thought I was gonna suffocate back there...
Whatever beef they have going on is sucking all the
peace out of this island...

And it's not like they're outright fighting either.
Ah well, guess I'll just kill some time here—

Huh? There's something sticking out of the sand...
Is that a soda bottle? Why would that be here...?

And there's a paper inside... A regular ol' message
in a bottle. Somebody knows how to spice things up.
Let's see what it says...

"Thine eyes glimmer in the tenebrous dark. Behold,
the greatest bounty of shadows birthed into this
world..."etcetera, etcetera.
Hmm, that's a seriously cryptic message—
(Wait a sec! Could this be some sort of code?!)

(If so...it's gotta be talking about treasure!
It says "bounty," so what else could it be?!)

(Alright, no sign of Alpha and Zeta. This little
secret is all mine!)

(If those two learn about it, they may very well beat
me to the treasure... Caution is king here!)
Heheheh... Things are finally getting fun!

Smell you later, restful resort life and pampered
survival experience! This is now the summer of the
great treasure hunt!
...Master Shadow sure is taking his time.

Yes, and his dinner has gone cold. Perhaps he didn't
want fish or meat...?

Could that really be it? I thought he mentioned going
for a walk.
Either way, it certainly is concerning...
I'll go look for him.

I'll join you. I suppose there's enough beach for
both of us to check.

Um... Well, whatever. We can both go check by the
beach.
